text: Keyboard-specific OEM key assigned as hotkey.
By keeping Shift pressed and giving right-click commands, orders ending in an attack move can be queued.
Hold SHIFT while right-clicking & dragging to draw a movement path for the selected units to follow.
Also selects the previous entity while in cinematic mode.
Also selects the next entity while in cinematic mode.
Holding ALT with an artillery unit selected commences 'manual aiming mode', which allows you to pick a bombardment target.
Hold CTRL while giving a drag order to make the selected units walk to their destination.
Hold LALT while right-clicking & dragging to drag the selected units while maintaining their dimensions.
Hold RALT while right-clicking & dragging to drag the selected units using the clicked location as the centre of the drag.
Hides user interface in battle and campaign. Hold down ALT while pressing this shortcut to enable cinematic bars.
In battle, double tap or hold <TAB> to open the Tactical Map.||In the Campaign, simply press <TAB> to open the Overview map.
You can cancel giving an order/drag move before releasing the mouse button by pressing escape or the alternate mouse button.
Hold CTRL and double left-click on a unit to select all units of that type.
Holding ALT and right-clicking on an enemy unit commences a melee attack while not in melee mode.
Holding SHIFT while selecting units selects all units positioned between your previous and latest selection. This is useful for selecting long lines of units.
Holding ALT, left-click & drag the selected units to adjust their location but maintain their positions relative to each other. Hold CTRL while doing so to rotate the selected units.
